entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
